nodes.documentation:
@title Crowdsale
@dev Crowdsale is a base contract for managing the PMB token crowdsale,
allowing investors to purchase tokens with Ether. This contract implements
such functionality in its most fundamental form and can be extended to provide additional
functionality and/or custom behavior.
The external interface represents the basic interface for purchasing tokens, and conforms
the base architecture for crowdsales. It is *not* intended to be modified / overridden.
The internal interface conforms the extensible and modifiable surface of crowdsales. Override
the methods to add functionality. Consider using 'super' where appropriate to concatenate
behavior.
nodes.name: Crowdsale

devdoc.details: Crowdsale is a base contract for managing the PMB token crowdsale, allowing investors to purchase tokens with Ether. This contract implements such functionality in its most fundamental form and can be extended to provide additional functionality and/or custom behavior. The external interface represents the basic interface for purchasing tokens, and conforms the base architecture for crowdsales. It is *not* intended to be modified / overridden. The internal interface conforms the extensible and modifiable surface of crowdsales. Override the methods to add functionality. Consider using 'super' where appropriate to concatenate behavior.

constructor.details: The rate is the conversion between wei and the smallest and indivisible token unit. So, if you are using a rate of 1 with a ERC20Detailed token with 18 decimals called PMB, 1 wei will give you 1 unit, or 0.001 PMB.

params.rate: Number of token units a buyer gets per wei
params.token: Address of the token being sold TODO
params.wallet: Address where collected funds will be forwarded to

rate().return: the number of token units a buyer gets per wei.

wallet().return: the address where funds are collected.

devdoc.title: Crowdsale
